definition: paternal aunt/husband's sister/husband's mother (old)/nun/for the time being (literary)
paternal aunt/husband's sister/husband's mother (old)/nun/for the time being (literary)

sentences.english: I'm your Aunt Monica. Yes, I am.
sentences.chinese: 宾，我是你姑姑摩妮卡，没错。

sentences.english: Aunt Dolly served me cookies and milk.
sentences.chinese: 多莉姑姑给我端来饼干和牛奶。

sentences.english: One day I was going to my auntie's home, mom told me to bring an umbrella in case it mined.
sentences.chinese: 一天我去姑姑家，妈妈叮嘱我带把伞以防下雨。

sentences.english: My aunt's family treated us with familiarly.
sentences.chinese: 我姑姑全家对我们很热情。

sentences.english: My aunt Kik was beautiful, lively, and giving.
sentences.chinese: 我的姑姑凯瑟琳活泼美丽，是个乐于奉献的人。

sentences.english: The studio is midway between his aunt's old home and his cottage.
sentences.chinese: 工作室就在从他姑姑的老宅到他的小屋的中途。

sentences.english: Aunt Isabella had not you and me to nurse her,' I replied.
sentences.chinese: “伊莎贝拉姑姑没有你和我来照应她，”我回答。

sentences.english: Now, Gracia lives with her aunt and can afford school fees.
sentences.chinese: 现在加西亚和姑姑住在一起并且可以上学了。

sentences.english: He toadies to his aunt, hoping to gain some of her money.
sentences.chinese: 他花言巧语地哄着他姑姑，想从她那儿弄些钱。

sentences.english: Aunt Sally was to find a cook, a lot, she signed up to personal interview.
sentences.chinese: 莱莉姑姑要找个厨师，良多人应征，她要亲身面试。

sentences.english: "Ring, "went the telephone. "Come to my house for lunch, "said Auntie Bear.
sentences.chinese: 铃铃铃，电话响了，“来我家吃午饭吧”熊姑姑说。

sentences.english: My aunt is too tight- fisted.
After lunch, I asked my aunt to teach me how to make a beef sandwich.
sentences.chinese: 午饭后，你请姑姑教你做牛肉三明治。

definition: father's sister's husband/husband of paternal aunt/uncle
older male cousin via female line
older female cousin via female line
younger female cousin via female line
wife of older male cousin via female line
